m_szDocTitle: Not the only car-of-the-future looking for a handout | The Energy Collective
m_szDocSumamry: Please login or register to follow this user. Not the only car-of-the-future looking for a handout Like it? Posted November 11, 2008 Michael Giberson Jeffrey Ball at the WSJ's Environmental Capital blog describes Xcel Energy's first steps in bringing Vehicle-to-grid power into its SmartGridCity effort in Boulder, Colorado: So far, it's pretty small potatoes, involving exactly one car and one plug. But boosters say it has the potential to revolutionize - and revitalize -- our aging power grid. Here's what's happened so far: Xcel Energy, Inc. spent $30,000 to convert a Ford Escape hybrid into a
